vv33:16.1: (Anantaraṃ caturavimānaṃ yathā vatthadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ.) → (yathā ca tattha evaṃ upari sabbavimānesu vitthāretabbaṃ) (bj), Anantaraṃ → itaraṃ (s2, s3)
vv33:56.1: (Anantaraṃ caturavimānaṃ yathā gandhapañcaṅgulikadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ.) → etthantare pāṭho bj potthake
vv33:72.3: Anusūyikā → anussūyikā (bj, pts2) | anussuyyikā (s2, s3, pts1), upaṭṭhāsiṃ → sūpaṭṭhāsiṃ (bj)
vv33:78.3: Akkodhanānatimāninī → akkodhanā anatimānī (bj, s2, s3, pts2) | anatimāni (pts1)
vv33:88.1: Anantaraṃ pañcavīsativimānaṃ yathā khīrodanadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ →  etthantare pāṭho sī potthake
vv33:122.1: Aṃsabaddhakaṃ → aṃsavaṭṭakaṃ (bj, pts1-2) | aṃsabandhakaṃ (s2, s3) | aṃsabandhanaṃ (mr)
vv33:143.3: addasāmi → addasaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2) | addasāsiṃ (pts-a)
vv33:144.1: Imāsāhaṃ → imāhaṃ (bj) | tāsāhaṃ (s2, s3, mr), sutvā → sutvāna (s2, s3, mr)
